comment._content: Miss Wllhelmina A. Boettcher, a noted nurse, says she may horsewhip Prof. Hugo Munsterberg, of Harvard, for calling her "abnormal" because she wrote a ... Source: Washington Post; May 3, 1913 Website: pqasb.pqarchiver.com/washingtonpost_historical/access/250...
